roleset.name: feed with breast, by breast
roleset.note: BREASTFEED-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel addition to PB of existing VN verb. VN class feeding-39.7. Framed by Claire. (from breastfeed.01-v)
BREASTFEEDING-N NOTES: Corresponds with breastfeed.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from breastfeeding.01-n)

example.name: No milk mentioned
example.text: She breastfed the baby up to a year.

example.name: Invented example, not really sure if alternation is possible
example.text: Mary breastfed her own natural milk to the baby.

example.name: Args 0 and 2
example.text: Ms. Jones' breastfeeding of baby Squishface seemed to help his gastrointestinal issues.
